title: Trudeau unveils new measures to mobilize industry in COVID-19 fight, bring Canadians home - CTV News

content: OTTAWA Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has announced a new plan to mobilize businesses and manufacturers to help fight the spread of COVID and boost the health sectors stockpile of life saving supplies and says the government is working with airlines t chars
